title: Baru
description: Buddhist temple cuisine in a clean and modern space, at 서울시종로구견지동715F. Managed by a Buddhist nun from the Choe Gae Sa Temple across the street. Reservations suggested. In the second floor of the same building is very simple temple cuisine buffet. Some dishes can also be ordered for additional price.
streetAddress: Temple Stay Building, 5th Floor, 71 Gyun Ji Dong, Jongno-Ku
